==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|antwürte}}, from {{inh|de|goh|antwurti}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*andawurdiją}}. The gender change from neuter to feminine is due to semantic association with {{m|de|Frage|t=question}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈantvɔʁt/}} * {{audio|de|De-Antwort.ogg|Audio}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Antwort.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f}} # [[answer]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|en}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|Frage|g=f}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Antworttendenz}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
